name: ax-addcl
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
comment: Closure law for addition of complex numbers. Axiom 4 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddcl . Proofs should normally use ~ addcl instead, which asserts the same thing but follows our naming conventions for closures. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
